extendedInfo.description: This application allow you to calculate the number of meal ticket(s) you have to give in order to pay your restaurant bill.This application provides you 2 solutions, in case you got change or not.You could also save your last calculation.A very useful toolbox for restaurant bill!If you like this app please rate it, and click on advertisment.Or simply buy the ads free version : https://market.android.com/details?id=com.flop.payetonresto
